short_summary: Remedial Excavation Program, Pacific Environmental Centre Site FY2023/2024, West Vancouver, B.C.
description: This contract is to establish a Remedial Excavation Program for the Pacific Environmental Centre Site in the fiscal year 2023/2024. The program will involve remedial excavation of contaminated sites and restoration of environmental health.
full_summary:
# Remedial Excavation Program - Invitation to Qualify

**Reference Number**: WS4046421973-Doc4046461276
**Publication Date**: June 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: June 29, 2023, at 2:00 pm ET

## Invitation to Qualify Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for a Remedial Excavation Program at the Pacific Environmental Centre Site in West Vancouver, British Columbia.

The project involves the remediation of contaminated soil and excavation of a site for environmental purposes.

**Key Details:**

* **Replacement Date**: August 7, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: The lowest priced responsive bid will be selected as the contractor.
* **Tender Delivery Region**: British Columbia and Canada.

## Contracting Entity

The contract will be administered by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) with the contractor carrying out work at the Pacific Environmental Centre Site in West Vancouver, British Columbia.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Fung, Donna (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL

The solicitation notice and any amendments can be accessed through the following URL:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16541305?extsite=MTY1NDEzMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This Invitation to Qualify expires on June 29, 2023, at 2:00 pm ET. Please ensure your bid or amendment is received before this deadline to be considered.  [1](https://canada.ca/en/services/business/procurement/policies-expenditures-reports.html#_section_3)
